about.title: Project Max-Stroy LLC
about.text: It occupies one of the leading positions among the design and survey organizations of road construction facilities in the republic.

histroy.first_section: On January 21, 2021, the limited liability company PROEKT MAX-STROY LLC was officially registered by the Yangihayot District Public Services Center.
histroy.second_section: On December 28, 2021, the Ministry of Construction of the Republic of Uzbekistan issued license number AJ-002018. The right to create design and estimate documentation for the construction, reconstruction and repair of highways for category II facilities was granted.
histroy.third_section: Today, our company occupies one of the leading positions among the design and survey organizations of road construction facilities in the republic and continues to provide professional services.
